Package org.blockchainnative.registry

Class FileSystemContractRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.blockchainnative.registry.ContractRegistry
      • org.blockchainnative.registry.FileSystemContractRegistry
  • public class FileSystemContractRegistry
extends ContractRegistry
    Implementation of ContractRegistry which stores ContractInfo objects as JSON files on the filesystem using ObjectMapper.

    The user is responsible for making sure that a ContractInfo registered with this registry can be successfully serialized through the use of com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper.

    Since:
    1.0

        public FileSystemContractRegistry​(java.nio.file.Path basePath)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new FileSystemContractRegistry with a given base path.
        Parameters:
        basePath - path to which the ContractInfo objects are stored to/loaded from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case the basePath exists but is no directory, or the creation of the directory fails

      • persist

        public void persist()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Saves all registered ContractInfo objects to the base path of the registry. Each ContractInfo is stored to a separate file named after its identifier.
        Specified by:
        persist in class ContractRegistry
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case an error occurs while writing to the file system.

      • load

        public void load()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads all ContractInfo objects from the base path of the registry
        Specified by:
        load in class ContractRegistry
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case an error occurs while reading from the file system.
